channel.title: Greatest way to be a pure mage any one know?
channel.description:
On my mage hes lvl 27 and has 37 mage hes not pure becouse i started out being a warrior 1st then switched to mage and was wondering why it costs so much gosh dang money to be a mage and if anyone could help me or tell me how to lvl up mage fast (BUT WITH OUT HACKING!!!) so if anyone has an idea or atleast a way to lvl mage up then plz tell and i know im willing to spend a ton of money on my mage :) so help if u can :D :D :D :D
:cool:

item.title: Greatest way to be a pure mage any one know?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

start a new account, aquire 3-4mil,
Train on goblins to 40 attack (Will be slow with 1str)
Then buy a mud staff (1.7mil) and buy some full iron and iron boots…
Buy 120k body runes at 10gp each.

Cast the best thing you can with that and dont do damage to ure opponent, train on the wizard person who is in the cage under the stairs at varrock castle.

Do that 120,000 times and u got 85mage 40 attack and probably 30-40 hp.

Read full topic
item.source: Greatest way to be a pure mage any one know?

item.title: Greatest way to be a pure mage any one know?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Gain defence, then wear the best armor you can which lowers your mage +attack then do curses/confuses/weakens. They give 33xp ea and cost about 10-25gp per spell if you buy the runes.

Read full topic
item.source: Greatest way to be a pure mage any one know?

item.title: Greatest way to be a pure mage any one know?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

If you can’t afford making a pure, don’t.

And your pure will suck against other pures, because you have melee stats…

Read full topic

item.title: Greatest way to be a pure mage any one know?
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

Fail

Mage is expensive because runes are expensive

I doubt there is anyone here skilled enough to pull off any sort of hack

I don’t really know what to recommend, since when I used my only mage pure 2 years ago, all my mage exp was gained PKing
